___location.description: Location of the contact. Depending on data quality, the exactness of this value may vary.

___emailHash.description: Either an MD5 or SHA-256 hash representation of the email address to query. Be certain to lowercase and trim the email address prior to hashing. (Queryable)

___email.description: The email address of the contact. (Queryable)

___facebook.description: URL of the contact's Facebook profile.

___twitter.description: Twitter handle of the contact. Acceptable formats include handle (with or without "@"), as well as the URL to the profile. (Queryable)

___linkedin.description: URL of the contact's LinkedIn profile.

___title.description: Current or most recent job title.

___organization.description: Current or most recent place of work.

___topics.description: The Topics Data Add-on includes a list of topics or subjects that the contact is associated with. This information is determined based off of several indicators of the contact's online and social presence.

___interests.description: The Affinities Data Add-on enables API consumers to better understand the interests of a contact. The data returned includes a list of interests that have been attributed to the contact, along with the level of affinity for the given interest and the category that the interest is within.

___photos.description: Additionally, any profile pictures and URLs to other websites associated width the contact will be returned.

___employment.description: The Employment History Data Add-on returns current and historical employment history for a given contact. This data includes the organization and title during employment and approximate start and end dates.

___urls.description: Additionally, any profile pictures and URLs to other websites associated width the contact will be returned.

___details.description: When included, additional details about the contact provided through Data Add-ons will be available here.
